text: The speaker of the Riksdag is the presiding officer of the national unicameral legislature in Sweden. Since 1975, the speaker, and no longer the monarch, appoints and fires the prime minister. The current speaker is Andreas Norl√©n, who has held the gavel since September 2018. ==List (since 1971)== Portrait Portrait Speaker (Born-Died) Term Term Term Political Party Election Constituency Portrait Portrait Speaker (Born-Died) Took office Left office Duration Political Party Election Constituency ==References== *
